titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to allow members of the Selected Reserve to use educational assistance for graduate programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Forces and Personnel.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received from DOD.

bill.summary: 2/23/1993--Introduced. Amends the Montgomery GI Bill educational assistance program to allow members of the Selected Reserve to use such assistance for the pursuit of graduate programs. (Currently, the use of such assistance is prohibited for pursuit of a program of education beyond the baccalaureate level.)
